title: JSGuardian
shortDescription: Improved security to protect your website and your users.
longDescription: Adds invisible protections to your site that upgrade page loads and links to the secure https protocol, sanitize input to remove malicious code, activate other protections to protect your site from attacks that can mislead your users, harvest their login credentials or private data, inject malicious code into your databases, or abuse your intellectual property.
instructions: You should immediately test your site after installing JSGuardian to ensure you are not preventing user actions you wish to allow. If your site collects input from users that is intended to be HTML, you may need to lower some protection levels. If your site JavaScript sets values to 'innerHTML' and breaks when JSGuardian is installed, it is likely you have a large security hole and should consider re-writing portions of your site to protect your company and your end-users.
author: AnyWhichWay, LLC dba Cyberzoa

categories.title: Security
categories.description: Apps which make your site safer and protect you from threats.

disclaimer.helpvalue: Note: This service is not a guarantee of site security, it just helps to improve it.

guardInnerHTML.description: Manage changes to documents via innerHTML, a well know security hole.

enumNames.strict: strict - ensure clean value is same as the one provided

guardInnerHTML.title: guardInnerHTML

enumNames.strict: strict - ensure clean value is the same as the one entered

guardPrompt.description: Manage input via JavaScript prompt function.

enumNames.prevent: prevent - do not allow the use of JavaScript prompt
enumNames.strict: strict - ensure clean value is the same as the one entered

guardPrompt.title: guardPrompt

enumNames.https-only: https-only - ensure all requests and links use secure protocol

guardWhen.description: Guard before or after a page has fully loaded. The 'after' option may be required on older site that load files to patch JavaScript functionality. Note, security will be reduced.
guardWhen.title: guardWhen

guardXSS.description: Turn on built-in browser defenses against XSS if available. Automatic in newer browsers.

enumNames.sanitize: santize - remove threats, similar to clean

guardXSS.title: guardXSS

introduction.helpvalue: JSGuardian by Cyberzoa helps to protect your site from attacks that can mislead your users, harvest their login credentials or private data, inject malicious code into your databases, or abuse your intellectual property.
